name: Jewel World - Match 3 Games
description:
Jewel World, embark on this match 3 adventure and solve puzzles with Princess.
Explore in legendary journey with the ultimate user matching experience and the little dog.
In a world full of addictive adventures, swap and crush the gems to complete the challenge.
Well - designed puzzles need to be solved with your clever brain
Connect beautiful jewels making combinations to experience a fantastical effect!

Follow the colorful jewel and gems to explore the magical world.
The journey of exploration is full of obstacles, breaking them and gaining treasure.
Blast jewels with your matching skill, train brain by solving puzzle.
There are various eye-catching scenes in the jewel world, such as: grassland, snow mountain...
Hope you can get a better mood in the jewels legendary.

FEATURES OF JEWEL WORLD:
- Easy and fun game puzzles
- 2000+ well - designed levels for players.
- A variety of game modes let you fondle admiringly.
- No time or place limit, enjoy puzzle fun any time and anywhere.
- No need network, you can still play games in no-wifi.
- Beautiful graphics let you keep your eyes open.
- No age limit, anyone can get good feeling in the game.
- Multiple awesome rewards prepared for you.

Jewel World is a best jewel game.Simple and fun, but it also can be a little challenging.
Easy to match but difficult to master.Try your best to get high score, collect stars to get rewards.

Download this casual now, add more fun to life.
